          <title>
            <string language="en">Loudness of different sounds</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lautstärke der unterschiedlichen Töne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Volume de différents bruits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Loudness de sons diferentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sonorità dei suoni differenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηχηρότητα των διαφορετικών ήχων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Intensidad de diversos sonidos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram compares two sounds A and B as seen from the oscilloscope where sound B has higher amplitude than sound A.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amplitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">frequencies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">loudness</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">microphones</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Oscilloscope</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pitch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm vergleicht zwei Töne A und B, 
wie vom Oszillograph gesehen, wo stichhaltiges B höheren Umfang als 
A, zu klingen hat.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme compare deux bruits A et B comme vu 
de l'oscilloscope où B sain a une amplitude plus élevée que 
retentir A.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama compara dois sons A e B como visto 
do osciloscópio onde B sadio tem uma amplitude mais elevada do que 
para soar A.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema confronta due suoni A e B come 
visto dall'oscilloscopio dove la B sana ha più alta ampiezza che 
suonare A.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα συγκρίνει δύο ήχους Α και β όπως 
βλέπει από τον παλμογράφο όπου το υγιές β έχει το 
υψηλότερο εύρος από να ηχήσει το Α.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama compara dos sonidos A y B según lo
considerado del osciloscopio donde B sano tiene amplitud más alta que
sonar A.</string>
          </description>
